original_text: On the other hand, if I had dealt treacherously against his life (and there is nothing hidden from the king), then you yourself would have stood aloof.”
korean_text: 아무 일도 왕 앞에는 숨길 수 없나니 내가 만일 거역하여 그의 생명을 해하였더라면 당신도 나를 대적하였으리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: if I had dealt treacherously against his life
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 그의 생명을 대하여 불충하게 했다면,

sentences.original_text: (and there is nothing hidden from the king)
then you yourself would have stood aloof.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신 자신이 멀리 서 있었을 것입니다.”
